attributes.action: It’s time the bbc stood on their own 2 feet
attributes.background: They are obviously anti brexit and therefore don’t have the people’s best interest at heart

rejection.details:
There are already petitions about abolishing the TV licence:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235653

And calling for a public inquiry:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234797

You might like to sign one or both of these petitions.
